text: Dame Vivienne Isabel Westwood (née Swire; 8 April 1941 – 29 December 2022) was a British fashion designer, political activist and businesswoman. She is known for bringing modern punk and new wave fashions into the mainstream. Westwood was born in Tintwistle, Cheshire. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British fashion designers Category:British activists Category:British businesspeople Category:People from Cheshire
title: Vivienne Westwood
